name: Select <style>&<script> tags
description: Selects all source HTML tags matching script, style, and inline style declaratios.
content:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">
<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
<meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
<title>MDaemon Log Analyzer</title>
<script src="js/jquery-1.7.1.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="ui/jquery-ui-1.8.18.custom.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="ui/minified/jquery.ui.core.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="ui/minified/jquery.ui.widget.min.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="ui/jquery.ui.mouse.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="ui/jquery.ui.button.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="ui/jquery.ui.position.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="ui/jquery.ui.dialog.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="ui/jquery.ui.draggable.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="js/jquery.elastic.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
<script src="js/jquery.timer.js" type="text/javascript" charset="utf-8"></script>
<script src="js/form_design_crib.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="js/tools.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="js/main.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<style type="text/css">
.container_26 {
	margin-left: auto;
	margin-right: auto;
	width: 1040px;
}
.grid_1, .grid_2, .grid_3, .grid_4, .grid_5, .grid_6, .grid_7, .grid_8, .grid_9, .grid_10, .grid_11, .grid_12, .grid_13, .grid_14, .grid_15, .grid_16, .grid_17, .grid_18, .grid_19, .grid_20, .grid_21, .grid_22, .grid_23, .grid_24, .grid_25, .grid_26, .grid_27, .grid_28, .grid_29, .grid_30 {
	display: inline;
	float: left;
	margin-left: 5px;
	margin-right: 5px;
}
.grid_1 {
	width: 30px;
}
.grid_3 {
	width: 110px;
}
.grid_4 {
	width: 150px;
}
.grid_5 {
	width: 190px;
}
.grid_7 {
	width: 270px;
}
.grid_8 {
	width: 310px;
}
.grid_9 {
	width: 350px;
}
.grid_10 {
	width: 390px;
}
.grid_13 {
	width: 510px;
}
.grid_18 {
	width: 710px;
}
.grid_24 {
	width: 950px;
}
.prefix_1 {
	padding-left: 40px;
}
.omega {
	margin-right: 0px;
}
* html .clearfix, :first-child + html .clearfix {
}
html, body, div, span, applet, object, iframe, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, p, blockquote, pre, a, abbr, acronym, address, big, cite, code, del, dfn, em, font, img, ins, kbd, q, s, samp, small, strike, strong, sub, sup, tt, var, b, u, i, center, dl, dt, dd, ol, ul, li, fieldset, form, label, legend, table, caption, tbody, tfoot, thead, tr, th, td {
	margin: 0px;
	padding: 0px;
	border: 0px none;
	outline: 0px none;
	font-size: 100%;
	vertical-align: baseline;
	background: none repeat scroll 0% 0% transparent;
}
body {
	line-height: 1;
}
ol, ul {
	list-style: none outside none;
}
:focus {
	outline: 0px none;
}
body {
	font: 12px/1.5 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, 'Liberation Sans', FreeSans, sans-serif;
}
h1 {
	font-size: 25px;
}
h3 {
	font-size: 21px;
}
h6 {
	font-size: 15px;
}
ul {
	list-style: disc outside none;
}
li {
	margin-left: 30px;
}
p, dl, hr, h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, ol, ul, pre, table, address, fieldset {
	margin-bottom: 20px;
}
.fdc_group {
	display: inline-block;
author: Yamel Amador Fdez
